translations: n.杏仁， 扁桃仁；杏树，扁桃树
【名】 （Almond）（英）阿尔蒙德，（法）阿尔蒙（人名）

phrs.translation: [化]杏仁饼（油脂已榨尽的杏仁渣滓）

sentences.sentence: Almond can also help your sleep because it contains tryptophan and magnesium.
sentences.translation: 杏仁一样可以帮助你的睡眠，因为它富含色氨酸和镁。

sentences.sentence: Blend up with low-fat milk or soy milk, some frozen blueberries, and perhaps some almond butter or oatmeal.
sentences.translation: 将低脂牛奶或豆奶、一些冷冻蓝莓、一些杏仁奶油或者燕麦片混合起来。

sentences.sentence: In case, you suffer from dry and itchy skin, massage your face and other exposed arms and legs with pure almond oil.
sentences.translation: 如果你的皮肤干燥发痒，用纯杏仁油按摩你的脸和其他裸露的胳膊和腿。
